Parameters: The identifier for the remote endpoint that sent the message.

The bytes of the message sent by the remote endpoint. This array will not exceed @B_com#google#android#gms#nearby#connection#Connections#MAX_RELIABLE_MESSAGE_LEN_E@ bytes for reliable messages, or @B_com#google#android#gms#nearby#connection#Connections#MAX_UNRELIABLE_MESSAGE_LEN_E@ for unreliable ones.
True if the message was sent reliably, false otherwise.
onMessageReceived(java.lang.String, byte.Description: Called when a message is received from a remote endpoint.
onMessageReceived(java.lang.String, byte.FullName: public abstract void onMessageReceived (String remoteEndpointId, byte[] payload, boolean isReliable)

Parameters: The identifier for the remote endpoint that disconnected.
onDisconnected(java.lang.String).Description: Called when a remote endpoint is disconnected / becomes unreachable.
